entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow or ice pellets. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of snow or ice pellets overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3. POP 30%
